name: 張玲毓
objective: In the second semester, this course first introduces the physical behavior in a simple mixture system and describes the chemical equilibrium by physical variables and state function. In addition to learning thermodynamics, we will also give the knowledge of chemical kinetics at the end of the semester.
schedule:
Week 1. Rules -Course Introduction and Phase equilibrium in one component system (CH4)
Week 2. Phase equilibrium in one component system (CH4)
Week 3. Phase equilibrium in two-component system (CH4)
Week 4. Thermodynamics of mixing (CH5) and QUIZ (I)
Week 5. The Thermodynamic of the ideal solution (CH5)
Week 6. Mid-term Exam
Week 7. The Thermodynamic of real solution (CH5)
Week 8. Phase diagram (1/2) (CH5)
Week 9. Phase diagram (2/2) (CH5)
Week 10. Ionic solution (CH5) and QUIZ (II)
Week 11. Colligative Properties (CH5)
Week 12. Midterm exam
Week 13. Chemical transformation, Equilibrium constant (CH6) 
Week 14. Electrochemical cell chemical cells (CH6)
Week 15. Chemical kinetics (CH17)
Week 16. Chemical kinetics (CH17)
Week 17. Chemical kinetics (CH17)
18. Final exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 5 
QUIZ (I): 5
QUIZ (II): 5
Mid-term exam(I): 20
Mid-term exam(II):30
Final exam: 35

Physical Chemistry
